ModMetaData.name: Gone Joyful Traits
ModMetaData.author: gwen blanket knight
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds 16 traits that affect how colonists enjoy the world around them. This mod is in an early phase. I tested as extensively as I could so bug reports are valued as well as balance feedback. used the buttons from https://opengameart.org/content/gui-buttons-0 as the background for the below images You have permission to translate the mod. I am willing to incorporate patches you make for other mods into this mod if you send me the code I need. [h1]SPECIAL THANKS[/h1] [url=https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=49129.0] LoonyLadle[/url] for helping me get the rimworld c# coding environment setup [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/moloyHasArc/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100] moloy559[/url] for helping me get my code base started [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/eBlairGames/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100] eBlair[/url] for coding up the required mod to allow joys altered by traits [h1]LOAD ORDER![/h1] GWEN DEFINITION PATCHS (near top of load order. I made it separate so the game wouldn't complain about doubled nullified fields) any mods that alter pawn thoughts such as psychology THIS (anywhere you'd normally put trait mods) [h1]SUPPORT THE MOD![/h1] You can support the mod by commenting on balance, making bug reports, and offering suggestions. You can also click these buttons to push the mod closer to the front page of the workshop. This is the best method for discovery other than word of mouth. [img=https://i.imgur.com/fVVaDCS.gif[/img] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/GwenLilyKnight/myworkshopfiles/]You can also follow my workshop page to see when a new mod is posted or check out my catalog[img]https://i.imgur.com/r1EtYC9.png[/img][/url] [url=https://discord.gg/WJmGCzH]You can also join my discord server to receive live progress reports or give live feedback.[img]https://i.imgur.com/0oTSG7x.png[/img][/url]
